member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.Core.LegendMode
member.summary: This custom type is accepted by the LegendMode property and controls the mode of the Xceed Chart for WinForms integrated legend. When the LegendMode property is set to Disabled the legend is not shown. In Automatic mode the legend displays the presentation groups of the component. In Manual mode the user is able to fill the legend with custom data. See the Configuring the Legend topic for more information.

MINreturns the minimum value contained in the subset
MAXreturns the maximum value contained in the subset
AVEreturns the average value of the subset
SUMreturns the sum of all values contained in the subset
ABSSUMreturns the absolute sum of all values contained in the subset

subset in the data series on which to perform the evaluation

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.AutomaticPalette
member.summary: When set to true the component uses automatically generated surface palette. When set to False the component uses a custom defined palette (the Palette property gives access to the custom palette).

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.DrawFlat
member.summary: Draws the surface in flat mode (contour chart). The PositionMode and PositionValue properties determine the vertical position of the surface.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.FillEffect
member.summary: Controls the fill effect applied to the surface. The user can modify the surface filling transparency, material properties like specular color, emissive color, shininess, as well as apply textures, gradients and patterns to the surface.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.FillStyle
member.summary: Controls the way in which the surface is filled. Currently there are two filling modes: zone filling and no filling.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.FrameLine
member.summary: Controls the appearance of the surface frame lines and dots.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.FrameStyle
member.summary: Controls the surface frame style. Supported values are: SurfaceFrameStyle.None - no frame at all SurfaceFrameStyle.Mesh - frame connecting the adjacent data points SurfaceFrameStyle.Contour - contour lines at specific surface elevations SurfaceFrameStyle.MeshContour - mixed mesh and contour frame SurfaceFrameStyle.Dots - dots at the data points

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.Interactivity
member.summary: Gives you access to the SeriesInteractivity object controlling the interactivity features of the data points.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.Palette
member.summary: Gives access to the custom palette associated with the surface. To make the chart use the custom palette you have to set the AutomaticPalette property to false.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.PaletteFrame
member.summary: When set to true the frame is displayed with the current palette colors (automatic or manual). When set to false the frame is displayed with the line properties accessible with the FrameLine property.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.PaletteSteps
member.summary: Controls the number of entries in the automatic palette if the SyncPaletteWithAxisScale is set to false. Valid only when AutomaticPalette is set to true.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.PositionMode
member.summary: The PositionMode property controls the vertical position of the surface, when it is rendered in flat mode (DrawFlat property is set to True).

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.PositionValue
member.summary: The PositionValue property specifies the value for the vertical position of the surface when the DrawFlat property is set to True and the PositionMode is SurfacePositionMode.CustomValue.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.SmoothPalette
member.summary: When this property is enabled the zone colors gradate smoothly from one to another.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.SyncPaletteWithAxisScale
member.summary: Synchronizes the number of palette entries in the automatic palette with the current scale of the vertical axis on which the series is displayed. Valid only when AutomaticPalette is set to true. Otherwise the PaletteSteps property is considered.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.Core.SurfaceSeriesBase.ValueFormatting
member.summary: Gives access to the ValueFormatting object controlling the formatting of the elevation (Y) values.
